# init(named:isTemplate:displayStyle:)

**Initializer**

Creates an image from an image file in the extension’s bundle, specifying the display style.

## Declaration

```swift
init(named name: String, isTemplate: Bool? = nil, displayStyle: DisplayRepresentation.Image.DisplayStyle)
```
title: init(named:isTemplate:displayStyle:)
